adventure_overview: Play active games with your family and den, including a box derby race. Prior to any activity, use Scouting America SAFE Checklist to ensure the safety of all those involved. All participants in official Scouting America activities should become familiar with the Guide to Safe Scouting and applicable program literature or manuals.

requirements.text: Play a game with your den.

activities.name: Lion Red Light Green Light
activities.description: Play a game of  Red Light Green  Light.

activities.name: Speed Gaming
activities.description: Cub Scouts will sample different board games by playing them in a round-robin speed format.

requirements.text: Participate in an obstacle course relay.

activities.name: Lion Obstacle Course
activities.description: Create and run an obstacle course.

activities.name: Playground Obstacle Course
activities.description: Use a local playground to create an obstacle course.

activities.name: Portal Obstacle Course
activities.description: Make a portal-type obstacle course with painter’s tape.

requirements.text: Build a box derby and participate in a race.
